From Umar to Muzammil: Who are the six doctors behind Delhi Red Fort blast
description: A trans-state white-collar terror module involving doctors, clerics, and professionals, linked to Jaish-e-Mohammed and Ansar Ghazwat-ul-Hind, was unearthed after a high-intensity explosion near Delhi's Red Fort. Joint operations led to the arrest of seven suspects and the recovery of over 2,900 kg of explosives and firearms.

title: Red Fort blast probe: Mother’s DNA to be matched to confirm identity of lone wolf fidayeen
description: Delhi Police are using DNA from a severed arm to identify the lone wolf fidayeen bomber near Red Fort. Investigators believe Dr. Umar Un Nabi, a doctor from Pulwama, carried out the attack. Evidence suggests a Jaish-e-Muhammed module was involved, seeking revenge. Raids are ongoing to apprehend other members.

description: In-form wicketkeeper-batter Dhruv Jurel is confirmed to play in India's opening Test against South Africa, a decision driven by his stellar recent performances, including two centuries for India A. Assistant coach Ryan ten Doeschate indicated Jurel will feature alongside Rishabh Pant, likely as a specialist batter.

description: The Trump administration's proposed shift from an H-1B visa lottery to a wage-weighted system faces strong criticism from Nasscom and other trade bodies. Concerns include operational disruption, potential for manipulation, and negative impacts on early-career professionals and small businesses. Critics argue the move is economically flawed and legally questionable.

title: 'She is my wife, nothing to hide': Rashid Khan clarifies viral photo, confirms marriage
description: Afghanistan's star cricketer Rashid Khan has officially confirmed the identity of the woman in a viral photograph from a charity event. He revealed on Instagram that she is his wife, whom he married in August. Rashid clarified that the speculation was unnecessary and emphasized their commitment to transparency, redirecting focus to his foundation's humanitarian work.

description: Al-Falah University has issued a statement addressing recent allegations, clarifying its role and condemning "baseless and misleading stories" online. The university confirmed two doctors were detained but not acting in official capacities, and denied any prohibited materials were used on campus. They pledged full cooperation with investigations and reaffirmed commitment to academic excellence and national security.

title: ‘I wanna get off!’: Panic inside US metro as driver dozes off; train races through tunnel
description: A San Francisco train driver fell asleep at the controls, causing a packed Muni metro train to dangerously accelerate through a curve. Panicked passengers were thrown to the floor, with one requiring treatment for a concussion. The SFMTA attributed the incident to operator fatigue after an investigation found no mechanical issues.

LinkedIn founder responds to Pope Leo XIV; says tech is good or bad by its use
description: LinkedIn co-founder Reid Hoffman pushes back against Pope Leo XIV's call for ethical AI development. Hoffman insists technology's moral value rests on human choices, not inherent design. He argues for continued AI acceleration with careful guidance. Hoffman also opposes AI systems marketed as emotional companions. He believes early AI adopters will gain economic and cultural dominance.

title: Lionel Messi's Hyderabad visit confirmed - Check details
description: Football legend Lionel Messi is set to visit Hyderabad on December 13, 2025, as part of his 'GOAT India Tour 2025'. Telangana Chief Minister Revanth Reddy confirmed the visit, highlighting it as a proud moment for the state. The tour will also include stops in Kolkata, Mumbai, and New Delhi, culminating in a grand event in Mumbai.

description: Police are investigating if the recent Red Fort blast was part of a foiled plot targeting Republic Day. Suspect Dr Muzammil Ganaie conducted multiple reconnaissance visits to the Red Fort area in January 2025, suggesting a planned attack on January 26. This plan may have been thwarted by heightened security during the celebrations.

title: Turkey cargo plane crash: All 20 aboard killed near Georgia-Azerbaijan border
description: A Turkish military C-130 cargo plane crashed in Georgia near the Azerbaijani border, killing all twenty personnel aboard. The aircraft, en route from Azerbaijan to Turkey, lost contact with authorities shortly after entering Georgian airspace. An investigation into the cause of the crash is underway.

The police spokesperson stated they do not confirm this information and are refuting the news.

The car, parked for two hours, is linked to a Pulwama owner, with investigators exploring potential terror links and a suspect in an explosives case.

Where did it go wrong? 1st Nithari investigator recalls delays that doomed probe
description: Nithari village hid horrors for months before 2006 discoveries. A missing woman's complaint led to an investigation.  The case relied heavily on a confession from domestic help Surinder Koli.  Police faced procedural challenges.  Later, Koli was freed in many cases due to doubts about his confession and evidence.

title: On death row for 16 years, Nithari accused Koli will now walk free
Delhi blast: Impact lifted and dropped my cab like a toy, survivor recalls
description: A cab driver, Sakir, recounts his harrowing escape from a blast in Delhi, describing his car being violently shaken and windows shattering. He sustained burns but feels fortunate compared to others in the ICU.  Doctors are providing excellent care, and he anticipates a swift discharge. His survival highlights the resilience of victims amidst the chaos.

title: Vibe coding: Meta’s AI chief has advice for teens: Says they should spend time on..
description: Meta's AI chief, Alexandr Wang, urges teenagers to master AI tools, likening the current era to the dawn of personal computing. He advises dedicating thousands of hours to 'vibe-coding' – hands-on experimentation with AI – to gain a significant future economic advantage, much like early programmers. This rapid, iterative approach is key to understanding and maximizing AI's potential.
